channel.title: thepersonever rss!!
channel.description: an rss feed for general updates on thepersonever!!! remember 2 clear ur cache!!

item.title: computer page updated!
item.description: come check out my new pc. and also some new photos that i forgot to post!

item.title: first 2025 digital art!
item.description: small update but like. i'm proud of it. i spent like 3 hours on it

item.title: the good scale... exists now!
item.description: yeah! this took a bit to make. it'll be updating it more as time goes on though!! (and i'll probably make a few more posts about it too)

item.title: new blog! (+ friends)
item.description: hey! everyone look!! new blog post!!! also i updated other parts of this site a little but nothing groundbreaking yet

item.title: ULTRAHELL IS REAL!!!
item.description: finished a new song!! it's kinda inspired by ultrakill, having both a battle and calm version of itself (it's also my first song in a while... bleh) i hope you all enjoy it!!!

item.title: new art stuff!
item.description: yeah. updated the 2025 art thing again!! go check it out :D

item.title: thoughts update!
item.description: uh. yeah this is the first update in like... a month. sorry. i made the thoughts page a lot easier to view on slower connections! now you don't need to reload the page (and the 26 kb swf) every time you want to view a new thought :p

item.title: THE UNTHINKABLE HAS HAPPENED...
item.description: i updated my sitemap. go me? literally all of study hall was dedicated to mobile JFP's pik2pedia :(

item.title: new blog post
item.description: me when the stupid fucking idiot has an f in every class. flabbergasted.png

item.title: vaulting
item.description: woah... who knew that to maintain a site you had to...l MAINTAIN IT???? ive been sick and its 4 am but i fixed some audio on room 2023 so i feel like a god

item.title: new personal page! (jadeshome)
item.description: just something i can easily edit if i want to. keep an eye on it if you really care i guess

item.title: new s3&k blog post!
item.description: in which jade harley laments the loss of an afternoon

item.title: made a webring!
item.description: flashfans is my new macrodobe flash webring! go join it if your site uses flash in any way :D

item.title: new blog post
item.description: my head hurts

item.title: something more to say, actually
item.description: i finally got around to adding all my 2024 traditional drawings to the art page! a lot of my digital art has been in animations so i don't have a lot for the digital 2024 section... make sure to scroll to the bottom of the drawings if you want to look at all of them in chronological order! i suck at drawing

item.title: new albums on the cd page!
item.description: not much more to say... i also fixed some typos though :D

item.title: mobile updates + complaining about text limit
item.description: hi! i updated parts of my site recently to make it more mobile-friendly. the main five TPE pages, and all of xDx3xP are now a lot easier to browse on vertical devices! i'm still working on random junk though, so expect that to be updated a little later </3 i also found out yesterday that nekoweb TRIES to cap its rss feeds' length so that text doesn't overflow. it doesn't really do a good job at it though, since text still overflows a lot on less-wide screens :/ you can click on this post to go to my rss feed! so that you can put it in a better rss reader!!! but i'll still try to keep my rss posts shorter from now on. try.

item.title: more small news
item.description: hey! not much to report on today. brought my actual laptop to school though!!! ...pikitory is going at a steady 1 page/panel per day, as per usual, but i'm drawing in flash now! i'm most likely gonna outline my process of turning vector drawings into clean sprites in the future, but you'll just have to WOOONDDEEERRRRR for now :3c the url for this page leads to the old pikitory flash i made in like... 2023? early 2024? that i've largely replaced everything for-only the scenerio and song remains for the new flash. this version's audio is also unsynced, due to being made in HTML5. sorry, but adobe animate fucking sucks!

item.title: working on pikitory again
item.description: hey! im working on the absolute pikitory amv that ive had in my head for a while now. i'm also making it in as3 now, as i've learned that HTML5 just... isn't there yet for animations i took a break from the amv a while ago due to people stress... i'm currently experiencing people stress again. send help technically im actually still in school right now but who cares

item.title: postbox done!
item.description: yeah that's really all i have. i hope it looks good :p

item.title: okay cool. good. nice.
item.description: okay figured it out. nekoweb wants two articles until it starts posting on the feed. okay. also i moved it to https://thepersonever.net/tools/rss if you want to use my shitty item generator

item.title: test part 2
item.description: ugh. gotta set up guid on the rssgen page. https://psfla.net/tests/rss.html btw

item.title: woohoo nekotests
item.description: testing? testing???... is this thing on? i made a webpage just for this if this doesn't work i'll
